committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Interior to convey, without consideration, certain lands in Lane County, Oregon.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Interior to convey, without consideration, all right, title, and interest of the United States in certain land in Lane County, Oregon, to persons with documented proof that they were deprived of property titles as a result of a specified survey by the Bureau of Land Management.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Interior to convey, without consideration, certain lands in Lane County, Oregon.
